c74object.name: hoa.spat
c74object.description:
hoa.spat
allow you to spatialize several point sources. You can control sources with a list of value in the first inlet, zoom in/out, add or remove loudspeakers, modify the distance between listener and loudspeaker...

metadatalist.metadata: hoa.library by Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

outlet.name: nb-sources
outlet.digest: Output number of sources actually in the scene.
outlet.description: Output number of sources actually in the scene.

method.name: add
method.digest: Add source to the scene with cartesian coordinates.
method.description: Add source to the scene with cartesian coordinates.

method.name: pol
method.description: Move source with polar coordinates (radius range : -pi | pi).

method.name: text
method.digest: Add some text to your source.
method.description: Add some text to your source (pass "" to reset).

method.name: (mouseclick)
method.digest: Add a source in the scene if there isn't already one.
method.description: Add a source in the scene if there isn't already one.

method.name: (mousedrag)
method.digest: Move a source if you click on it before, or all selected sources if the source you move is a part of a selection, make a rect selection otherwise.
method.description: Move a source if you click on it before, or all selected sources if the source you move is a part of a selection, make a rect selection otherwise.

method.name: (ctrl+mousedrag)
method.digest: Drag Move only the angle of a source or the selected sources.
method.description: Drag Move only the angle of a source or the selected sources.

method.name: (shift+mousedrag)
method.digest: Drag Move only the distance of a source or the selected sources.
method.description: Drag Move only the distance of a source or the selected sources.

method.name: (cmd+a)
method.digest: select all sources actually in the scene.
method.description: select all sources actually in the scene.

method.name: (cmd+mouseclick)
method.digest: Toggle source selection if you click on it.
method.description: Toggle source selection if you click on it.

method.name: (mousemove)
method.digest: Display Angle of the source if you are hover it.
method.description: Display Angle of the source if you are hover it.

attribute.name: speaker_number
attribute.description: Specify the Number of loudspeakers to display.

attribute.name: speaker_distance
attribute.digest: Change Speaker to head distance (in meters).
attribute.description: Change Speaker to head distance (in meters).

attribute.name: bgcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Background color.

attribute.name: gridcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Grid color.

attribute.name: headcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Head color.

attribute.name: lscolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the LoudSpeakers color.
